faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most popular questions about NEON QTG
faq.a1: NEON QTG is a new type of neuromachines using quantum topology and advanced filtering algorithms to achieve unprecedented performance in artificial intelligence.
faq.a2: 4 model levels available: NEON-QTG-7B (6.2B parameters), NEON-QTG-30B (23.6B parameters), NEON-QTG-100B (100B parameters) and NEON-QTG-5.5Q (5.5Q parameters).
faq.a3: NEON-QTG-7B is production ready (2025), NEON-QTG-30B planned for 2025-2026, NEON-QTG-100B for 2026-2027, and NEON-QTG-5.5Q for 2050+.
faq.q4: How does the filtering algorithm work?
faq.a4: The algorithm uses embedding space construction, Vietoris-Rips complex computation, persistence diagram calculation and noise filtering through persistence threshold with weighted projection of topological features.
faq.q5: What is the cost of models?
faq.a5: Cost varies from $18K for basic model to $100T for maximum configuration, depending on power level and infrastructure requirements.
faq.a6: You can contact MagistrTheOne by email: maxonyushko71@gmail.com or through social networks GitHub, LinkedIn and Twitter.
